币安Binance中文频道: ForeverCR7: GOAT NFT 已在 #币安NFT 独家发售！ 集齐七种不同设计的普通级(N) #NFT ，即有机会与C罗一起训练。现在分享你热爱的运动的照片，就像C罗热爱足球一样，可免费集CR7 NFT！ ✅关注+转推+评论区@三位好友 ✅用标志动作分享你热爱的运动 ⚽️7位创意者每人获得CR7 N级NFTx3 #Binance #币安

entry.title: RT Willy Woo: Price action has largely been dominated by demand stemming from the calendar futures markets, the instrument of pros and institutions. E...
entry.summary: RT Willy Woo Price action has largely been dominated by demand stemming from the calendar futures markets, the instrument of pros and institutions. Even now, demand keeps surging, suggesting we are in the early stages of another price squeeze.
